org.cougaar.core.adaptivity
Class SensorCondition

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.adaptivity.OMCBase
      org.cougaar.core.adaptivity.SensorCondition
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Condition
public class SensorCondition
extends OMCBase
implements Condition

A class to hold a sensor condition. Most sensors will subclass this class to add a private or package protected setValue method to preclude arbitrary classes from messing with the value.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

SensorCondition

public SensorCondition(java.lang.String name,
                       OMCRangeList allowedValues)
Constructor with no specified initial value. The initial value is set to the effective value of the allowedValues.

Parameters:
name - the name of this SensorCondition
allowedValues - the list of allowed value ranges

Constructor with a specified initial value.
